overview: The documentary deals with Mithraism. The relationship and influence of the Mehri ritual in the Christian religion and the rejection of the natural and historical roots of the Mehr in different Asian and European cultures and nations is the subject of this research documentary. Mithraism has a longer history than any other religion in the general culture of Iran. "Mithraism" has been very effective in the formation of our Iranian culture.
title: The cross & Mithra
